name: Helix Jump (itch)
description:
Helix sets a new standard for realistic ball physics and graphical detail in Jump Ball 3D games employing cutting-edge visuals, challenging levels, true-to-life ball physics and combines them with innovative features not found in any other Jumping ball bounce game.

Features 

- Three levels for more challenge, easly to add more

- The most natural and precise physics are applied.

- Colorful and vivid 3D HD graphics!

- Easy and casual controls

- Single mode: Challenge for higher score

- Achievement and Leader Score supported
